com.pi4j.io.serial

Class OdroidSerial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pi4j.io.serial.OdroidSerial

  • public class OdroidSerial
extends Object
    This class simply exposed the available UART/serial port address (device file paths) that are exposed on the Odroid C1/C1+/C2. SEE: http://odroid.com/dokuwiki/doku.php?id=en:c1_hardware_uart
